name: cisco-ise
label: Cisco ISE
description: Cisco ISE connector provides actions like, list all active sessions, quarantine IP/Mac address, un-quarantine IP/Mac address etc.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: IP address or FQDN of the Cisco ISE server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: ipaddr

fields.title: Username
fields.description: Username to access the Cisco ISE to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: username

fields.title: Password
fields.description: Password to access the Cisco ISE server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: password

fields.title: ERS Port
fields.description: External RESTful Services (ERS) is a REST API based on HTTPS over port 9060. This is required to be specified for ERS API operations.
fields.name: port

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify

operations.title: List All Active Sessions
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all active sessions from Cisco ISE.

operations.title: Get Internal User Details
operations.description: Get Internal User Details

parameters.title: User ID
parameters.name: userid
parameters.tooltip: User ID can be found via List Internal Users action

operations.title: List Internal Users
operations.description: Get all the internal users.

operations.title: Disable Internal User
operations.description: Sets Internal User Status to: Disabled

operations.title: Enable Internal User
operations.description: Sets Internal User Status to: Enabled

operations.title: List Guest Users
operations.description: Get all the Guest Users.

parameters.title: Sponsor Username
parameters.name: filter.sponsorUserName
parameters.tooltip: Username for the sponsor of the guest account

parameters.title: Phone Number
parameters.name: filter.phoneNumber
parameters.tooltip: Phone number should be E.164 format, exp: +13211239034

operations.title: Get Guest User Details
operations.description: Get Guest User Details

parameters.title: User ID
parameters.name: userid
parameters.tooltip: User ID can be found via List Guest Users action

operations.title: Suspend Guest User
operations.description: Suspend Guest User

operations.title: Reinstate Guest User
operations.description: Reinstate Guest User

operations.title: EPS: Quarantine IP Address
operations.description: Quarantines an IP address that you have specified on Cisco ISE.

parameters.title: Target IP Address
parameters.name: target_ipaddr
parameters.tooltip: IP Address to quarantine
parameters.description: IP address of the device to quarantine on Cisco ISE.

operations.title: EPS: Quarantine MAC Address
operations.description: Quarantines a MAC address that you have specified on Cisco ISE.

parameters.title: Target MAC Address
parameters.name: target_mac
parameters.tooltip: MAC Address to quarantine
parameters.description: MAC address of the device to quarantine on Cisco ISE.

operations.title: EPS: Un-Quarantine IP Address
operations.description: Removes an IP address that you have specified from the quarantine list on Cisco ISE.

parameters.title: Target IP Address
parameters.name: target_ipaddr
parameters.tooltip: IP Address to un-quarantine
parameters.description: IP address of the device to un-quarantine on Cisco ISE.

operations.title: EPS: Un-Quarantine MAC Address
operations.description: Removes a MAC address that you have specified from the quarantine list on Cisco ISE.

parameters.title: Target MAC Address
parameters.name: target_mac
parameters.tooltip: MAC Address to un-quarantine
parameters.description: MAC address of the device to un-quarantine on Cisco ISE.

operations.title: End a Target MAC Address Session
operations.description: Ends a session of the MAC address that you have specified on Cisco ISE.

parameters.title: Target MAC Address
parameters.name: target_mac
parameters.tooltip: MAC Address to end session
parameters.description: MAC address to end the session on Cisco ISE.

operations.title: MAC Address Logout
operations.description: Logs off a session of the MAC address that you have specified on Cisco ISE.

parameters.title: Target MAC Address
parameters.name: target_mac
parameters.tooltip: MAC Address to log out
parameters.description: MAC address to log out from Cisco ISE.

parameters.title: Target Server Address
parameters.name: target_server
parameters.tooltip: Server to log out target machine
parameters.description: Server address from which you want to log out the target machine.

operations.title: Get Endpoints
operations.description: Retrieves details for all ERS endpoints or a specific endpoint from Cisco ISE based on the endpoint ID or name and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Get Endpoint By
parameters.name: get_endpoint_by

Endpoint ID.title: Endpoint ID
Endpoint ID.name: id
Endpoint ID.description: ANC endpoint ID based on which you want to retrieve details from Cisco ISE.

Endpoint Name.title: Endpoint Name
Endpoint Name.name: endpoint_name
Endpoint Name.description: ANC endpoint name based on which you want to retrieve details from Cisco ISE.

parameters.description: Choose the method using which you want to retrieves endpoint details from Cisco ISE. You can choose between Endpoint ID or Endpoint Name.If you choose 'Endpoint ID', then you must specify the following parameter:Endpoint ID: ID of the ANC endpoint whose details you want to retrieve from Cisco ISE.If you choose 'Endpoint Name', then you must specify the following parameter:Endpoint Name: Name of the ANC endpoint whose details you want to retrieve from Cisco ISE.

parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: The number of results to return for on each page
parameters.description: Number of results that the operation should include per page. The search result is by default paged to 20 results per page.
parameters.name: size

parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: The page number of results to return
parameters.description: Page number from which you want to retrieve results. Page numbering starts at page 1.
parameters.name: page

operations.title: Get ANC Endpoint
operations.description: Retrieves details for all Adaptive Network Control (ANC) endpoints or a specific ANC endpoint from Cisco ISE based on the ANC Endpoint ID and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: ANC Endpoint ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: ANC endpoint ID which you want to retrieve details
parameters.description: ID of the ANC endpoint whose details you want to retrieve from Cisco ISE.

parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: The number of results to return for on each page
parameters.description: Number of results that the operation should include per page. The search result is by default paged to 20 resources per page.
parameters.name: size

parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: The page number of results to return
parameters.description: Page number from which you want to retrieve results. Page numbering starts at page 1.
parameters.name: page

operations.title: Create ANC Policy
operations.description: Creates and ANC policy in Cisco ISE based on the ANC policy name and action you have specified.

parameters.title: ANC Policy Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.tooltip: Specify Policy Name which you want to apply on the MAC address or IP Address.
parameters.description: Name of the policy that you want to create on Cisco ISE.

parameters.title: Action
parameters.name: actions
parameters.description: Type of actions to be applied to the ANC policy that you want to create on Cisco ISE. You can choose from the following options: Quarantine, Portbounce, or Shutdown.

operations.title: Get ANC Policy
operations.description: Retrieves details for all ANC policies or a specific ANC policy from Cisco ISE based on the policy ID or name and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Get Policy By
parameters.name: get_policy_by

Policy ID.title: Policy ID
Policy ID.name: id
Policy ID.description: Policy ID based on which you want to retrieve details from Cisco ISE.

Policy Name.title: Policy Name
Policy Name.name: policy_name
Policy Name.description: Policy name based on which you want to retrieve details from Cisco ISE.

parameters.description: Choose the method using which you want to retrieves ANC Policies from Cisco ISE. You can choose between Policy ID or Policy Name.If you choose 'Policy ID', then you must specify the following parameter:Policy ID: ID of the ANC policy whose details you want to retrieve from Cisco ISE.If you choose 'Policy Name', then you must specify the following parameter:Policy Name: Name of the ANC policy whose details you want to retrieve from Cisco ISE.

parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: The number of results to return for on each page
parameters.description: Number of results that the operation should include per page. The search result is by default paged to 20 resources per page.
parameters.name: size

parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: The page number of results to return
parameters.description: Page number from which you want to retrieve results. Page numbering starts at page 1.
parameters.name: page

operations.title: Assign ANC Policy
operations.description: Assigns a specific ANC policy to a MAC address or an IP address on Cisco ISE based on the policy or name and the MAC or IP address you have specified.

parameters.title: ANC Policy Name
parameters.name: policyName
parameters.tooltip: Specify Policy Name which you want to apply on the MAC address or IP Address.
parameters.description: Name of the ANC policy that you want to apply to a specific MAC or IP address on Cisco ISE.

parameters.title: Apply To
parameters.name: apply_to

MAC Address.title: MAC Address
MAC Address.name: macAddress
MAC Address.tooltip: MAC Address on which you want to apply policy
MAC Address.description: Specify MAC Address on which you want to apply policy.

IP Address.title: IP Address
IP Address.name: ipAddress
IP Address.tooltip: IP Address on which you want to apply policy
IP Address.description: Specify IP Address on which you want to apply policy.

parameters.description: Choose whether you want to apply the specific ANC policy to a Mac Address or an IP address.If you choose 'IP Address', then you must specify the following parameter:IP Address: IP Address on which you want to apply the specified policy.If you choose 'MAC Address', then you must specify the following parameter:MAC Address: MAC Address on which you want to apply the specified policy.

operations.title: Revoke ANC Policy
operations.description: Revokes a specific ANC policy from a MAC address or an IP address on Cisco ISE based on the policy or name and the MAC or IP address you have specified.

parameters.title: ANC Policy Name
parameters.name: policyName
parameters.tooltip: Specify Policy Name which you want to revoke from the MAC address or IP Address.
parameters.description: Name of the ANC policy that you want to revoke from a specific MAC or IP address on Cisco ISE.

parameters.title: Revoke From
parameters.name: revoke_from

MAC Address.title: MAC Address
MAC Address.name: macAddress
MAC Address.description: Specify MAC Address which you want to revoke policy.

IP Address.title: IP Address
IP Address.name: ipAddress
IP Address.description: Specify IP Address which you want to revoke policy.

parameters.description: Choose whether you want to revoke the specific ANC policy from a Mac Address or an IP address.If you choose 'IP Address', then you must specify the following parameter:IP Address: IP Address from which you want to revoke the specified policy.If you choose 'MAC Address', then you must specify the following parameter:MAC Address: MAC Address from which you want to revoke the specified policy.
